document_data.mainbody:
Aniolon Gruanthe was a wizard from Estagund who led a number of other arcanists and malcontents away from the kingdom to found the town of Lliiress. He made a deal for the protection of the blue dragon Gerinvioch after the dragon trapped the town with the Evise Jhontil, Aniolon was slain by the artifact.
He had stubby fingers, thinning black hair, but he was rather young,
Aniolon Gruanthe was enthralled by power over other people, but was swift to resort to bizarre schemes, such as entreating with a dragon, for the sake of obtaining it. He cared for the people under his reign only nominally.
He pitied those who served something they didnt believe in.
Gruanthe could cast at least one scrying spell. He also could bind imps to his service.
Aniolon wore the accoutrements of a wizard.
Aniolon briefly bound the imp Quiono in .
Prior to , Gruanthe had become the leader of a splinter faction of mages and clerics from Estagund, most importantly from the faiths of Sharess and Lliira, whom he promised to lead into a new place, where they could worship freely, without concern for the laws of Estagund. Before that he had once been a rival of Umbeso in seeking positions of power,
On , while in Lliiress, Gruanthe came up with the scheme to request the aid of the blue dragon Gerinvioch. He summoned an imp to scout out the lair,
Gruanthe sent a team of twenty to acquire the artifact twelve of them died in the process, with four more dying on the way back. He then sent word to the dragon, who arrived and began a ritual the human tried to smooth over the doubts of those who were still unsure about the dragons spell.
After the dragon completed his spell, and the town discovered alongside Gruanthe that they were trapped and that spells would kill them, Gruanthes mood and stability began to slip from frustration. He died shortly after, when the temptation to scry on Gerinvioch became too great.
The blue dragon Gerinvioch taunted Kinase Bronihim with the name of Gruanthe.
